title: Emerald and Diamond Floral Cascading Haaram - NEC03006
materials: this Haaram features brilliant-cut diamonds (4.70 carats total weight) complemented by two vibrant emeralds (2.55 carats total weight)
and twelve lustrous South Sea Pearls (27.60 carats total weight). The gold showcases a radiant Hyderabadi Polish
features: This exquisite Haaram embodies traditional South Indian elegance with a modern twist. The floral motifs are intricately set with diamonds, creating a dazzling effect. The central pendant features a cascading design, culminating in a pear-shaped emerald framed by delicate diamond detailing. Twelve pearls are carefully placed along the lower edge of the necklace, adding a touch of timeless grace. The design reflects nakshi work, albeit with a modern interpretation using diamonds.
colors: The color palette is a harmonious blend of the white brilliance of diamonds
the creamy luster of South Sea Pearls
and the warm yellow of the 18K gold.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions such as weddings (Vivaha Mahotsavam)
and milestone celebrations. Its sophisticated design also makes it suitable for upscale social gatherings and formal events.
